column4: Why is my wireless connection so slow ? max 30 KB/s when I download ubuntu updates or apt-get ?
Are the repositories supposed to download with max 30KB/s ?
some. us.archive is very slow for me, I set up a different one using system->admin->software sources
how can I choose what server ?
Select best server ?
system->admin->software sources, see the dropdown tab . That may work, it depends on ping but the server itself may be limited. You have to try a few
if the repo is the only slow thing, it's bound to be the server end. Try some of the bandwidth testers first. google bandwidth test ;)
ok I'm doing that right now
hey man, thanks for earlier, it was the Canadian server running 30 KB/s :|
yw.
and I'm glad thats all it was ;)
Do you happen to know if WIne is in the repositories? I am afrait that if I do apt-get install wine that I will get a different application.
yes it is.
DasEi: so apt-get install wine ?
yep. Or check that link, you can usually get a useful deb of the very latest version
it's one of the few things I ever mention getting from outside the ubuntu repos
you should try using the synaptic package manager until you get a handle on how the repositories work. Fewer commands to learn, cuz it gui, and it has some pretty useful quirks
yes, but I want to learn commands :)
GUI is too easy
ah, but it will get you up to speed, so you can move on to the real package manager, aptitude ;)
oh ok, I'll look into it, ty!
